text: The Baojun E100 is a electric microcar made by SAIC-GM-Wuling under Baojun from 2017 to 2021. == History and Features == The Baojun E100 (from Baojun a brand of SAIC-GM-Wuling joint venture) was launched in 2016 and started being produced at the same year the E100 is the first electric car from the Baojun brand. and has a electric motor with 29 kW (39 hp) and a range of 250 km (155.3 mi) with a single speed transmission it was improved in 2018 with a bigger range. == Markets == The Baojun E100 was sold only in The Chinese market it was initially sold only in the Guangxi province but it started being sold in the city of Qingdao in the Shandong province. == Discontinuation == The production of The E100 ended in 2021 it was discontinued without a sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Baojun E100
